description: Episode number 4 of Series "Behavior Theory in Practice". Shows procedure for conditioning homogeneous and heterogeneous behaviour chains. Demonstrates shaping of complex behaviour chains in pigeons, dogs in obedience trials, police dogs and guide dogs, showing practical application of laboratory findings
